# VisualShaderNodeTransformCompose

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Composes a [Transform3D](Transform3D.md) from four [Vector3](Vector3.md)\\ s within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Creates a 4Ã—4 transform matrix using four vectors of type ``vec3``. Each vector is one row in the matrix and the last column is a ``vec4(0, 0, 0, 1)``.
